message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV

This paper is primarily focused on natural language processing (NLP) tasks, specifically language modeling and natural language inference. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper proposes a novel method of incorporating sememes into recurrent neural networks (RNNs), which falls under the umbrella of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely categories as well. The paper also mentions the use of bidirectional RNNs, which are commonly used in speech recognition and image captioning tasks, making cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) a possible category. Finally, the paper evaluates the robustness of the proposed method against adversarial attacks, which is a common concern in computer vision (CV) tasks, making cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) a possible category as well.
